steps: decided to wait for a bus
think of a destination to go to
lookup the bus needed to get there online
map out where the bus stop is
make sure the bus is on time

branching_info.option 1: buy a bus pass from a ticket selling machine
branching_info.option 2: download a ticket selling app and buy a bus pass from your phone
freeform_ra: have limited data on the wireless plan
receive no wireless signal in the bus station
see a long line for the ticket machine
take bus to the school every morning
